body_html: @soumith it's hard to tell. If you don't take any action then signals sent to the parent should also be delivered to children. This means that Python must somehow be overriding the signal handling, and it might be hard for us to revert this change without breaking other things. We could try though.

body: @soumith it's hard to tell. If you don't take any action then signals sent to the parent should also be delivered to children. This means that Python must somehow be overriding the signal handling, and it might be hard for us to revert this change without breaking other things. We could try though.
